snippet.title: HallowMaze Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hallow Maze is an epic action adventure through an intricate world submerged in war. Explore twisting caves, enormous palaces, battle unhuman horrors and help those in need, in a gothic hand painted 2.5D artstyle.
Wishlist now in steam!!!! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3508560/Hallow_Maze/
#games #gaming #gamedev #indie #indiegame #adventure #action #soulslike #gothic #metroidvania #indiedev #steam
